recommended_actions.description: R sessions s1387-s1393 spent 5 consecutive sessions editing session-context.mjs (same file, same refactor) without completing the work. Sessions s1388 and s1392 noted the same diagnostic finding but no fix materialized. Pattern suggests R sessions get stuck in diagnostic loops on large files.
recommended_actions.action: Create wq item for session-context.mjs modular extraction (already in BRAINSTORMING.md). This would reduce the file from 1623 lines, making R sessions more productive when working on it.
